group_1.textRight: I'm glad you've woken up, how do you feel...?

group_1.textLeft: I’m fine now.  @Sorry to make you worry.
...More importantly, I need to tell you something.

group_1.textRight: Is it about the attack...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes.
I've actually seen that Magical Girl before...
Will you just die already![se:4055_landing_rotationjump_vh]

group_1.textRight: (This isn't an ordinary fight...)
(She's actually trying to kill them!)

group_1.textLeft: Apparently Mami and Kyoko were...
...attacked by the "Black Magical Girl".

group_1.textRight: You can't mean...

group_1.textLeft: This was back when all the witches started @showing up.
Back then...
It seemed like her goal was to learn more about @Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: ...I wonder why she came back to Kamihama now?
And Oriko...

group_1.textLeft: Oriko? Are you talking about a Magical Girl all in @white...?

group_1.textRight: Eh...? @You know her?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
The day I met the Black Magical Girl, I met her by @chance too…
She said she was looking for "Yuma"...
But I don't know if that was true...

group_1.textRight: What do you mean...?

group_1.textLeft: Because Yuma is Kyoko's friend.
And she asked me to tell Kyoko for her.
But Kyoko's reaction when I told her about the @message from Oriko.
...Well... @She was furious...

group_1.textRight: Like she had found an enemy?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
And it seems,
that they are both from Mitakihara...
Maybe Kyoko knows more about them...

group_1.textRight: Yup, I knew it. @I knew this was all connected from the start.

group_1.textLeft: ...So the rumors about Mitama's adjustments failing.
I wonder if this is their work...?
..."Slow down."

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Mami said that the Black Magical girl's power @is slowing things down...
Every girl she hurt,
thought they were moving normally. @But they couldn’t…

group_1.textRight: Hah!
Because the slow down magic was being used @on them!
You think you're fighting like normal,
but because the enemy gets to move faster, @you end up hurt!

group_1.textLeft: I knew it, this wasn't because of Mitama.
That's a relief.
Once she hears it's not her fault,
We should be able to cheer Mitama up again...

group_1.textRight: Now the issue is, why did they target Mitama...?

group_1.textCenter: If I say it's for the sake of the world.
Would you be willing to cooperate with me?

group_1.textLeft: I wonder, what could she have meant by that...?

group_1.textRight: Hmm…. We just don’t have enough info.…

group_1.textLeft: But she will be attacking us again, won’t she?

group_1.textRight: ...Probably.
I was able to strike a light wound, @but it will heal easily...

group_1.textLeft: For now though Team Mikazuki should probably...
Stay at the Coordinator's.
I'll call Kanagi too.

group_1.textRight: ...We will need to inform the Union too...
